00024 b3Scalar                                        gContactBreakingThreshold = b3Scalar(0.02);

00028 bool                                            gContactCalcArea3Points = true;

00033 static inline b3Scalar calcArea4Points(const b3Vector3 &p0,const b3Vector3 &p1,const b3Vector3 &p2,const b3Vector3 &p3)
00034 {
00035         // It calculates possible 3 area constructed from random 4 points and returns the biggest one.
00036 
00037         b3Vector3 a[3],b[3];
00038         a[0] = p0 - p1;
00039         a[1] = p0 - p2;
00040         a[2] = p0 - p3;
00041         b[0] = p2 - p3;
00042         b[1] = p1 - p3;
00043         b[2] = p1 - p2;
00044 
00045         //todo: Following 3 cross production can be easily optimized by SIMD.
00046         b3Vector3 tmp0 = a[0].cross(b[0]);
00047         b3Vector3 tmp1 = a[1].cross(b[1]);
00048         b3Vector3 tmp2 = a[2].cross(b[2]);
00049 
00050         return b3Max(b3Max(tmp0.length2(),tmp1.length2()),tmp2.length2());
00051 }
00052 #if 0
00053 
00054 //using localPointA for all points
00055 int b3ContactCache::sortCachedPoints(const b3Vector3& pt) 
00056 {
00057                 //calculate 4 possible cases areas, and take biggest area
00058                 //also need to keep 'deepest'
00059                 
00060                 int maxPenetrationIndex = -1;
00061 #define KEEP_DEEPEST_POINT 1
00062 #ifdef KEEP_DEEPEST_POINT
00063                 b3Scalar maxPenetration = pt.getDistance();
00064                 for (int i=0;i<4;i++)
00065                 {
00066                         if (m_pointCache[i].getDistance() < maxPenetration)
00067                         {
00068                                 maxPenetrationIndex = i;
00069                                 maxPenetration = m_pointCache[i].getDistance();
00070                         }
00071                 }
00072 #endif //KEEP_DEEPEST_POINT
00073                 
00074                 b3Scalar res0(b3Scalar(0.)),res1(b3Scalar(0.)),res2(b3Scalar(0.)),res3(b3Scalar(0.));
00075 
00076         if (gContactCalcArea3Points)
00077         {
00078                 if (maxPenetrationIndex != 0)
00079                 {
00080                         b3Vector3 a0 = pt.m_localPointA-m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA;
00081                         b3Vector3 b0 = m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA-m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA;
00082                         b3Vector3 cross = a0.cross(b0);
00083                         res0 = cross.length2();
00084                 }
00085                 if (maxPenetrationIndex != 1)
00086                 {
00087                         b3Vector3 a1 = pt.m_localPointA-m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA;
00088                         b3Vector3 b1 = m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA-m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA;
00089                         b3Vector3 cross = a1.cross(b1);
00090                         res1 = cross.length2();
00091                 }
00092 
00093                 if (maxPenetrationIndex != 2)
00094                 {
00095                         b3Vector3 a2 = pt.m_localPointA-m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA;
00096                         b3Vector3 b2 = m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA-m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA;
00097                         b3Vector3 cross = a2.cross(b2);
00098                         res2 = cross.length2();
00099                 }
00100 
00101                 if (maxPenetrationIndex != 3)
00102                 {
00103                         b3Vector3 a3 = pt.m_localPointA-m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA;
00104                         b3Vector3 b3 = m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA-m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA;
00105                         b3Vector3 cross = a3.cross(b3);
00106                         res3 = cross.length2();
00107                 }
00108         } 
00109         else
00110         {
00111                 if(maxPenetrationIndex != 0) {
00112                         res0 = calcArea4Points(pt.m_localPointA,m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA);
00113                 }
00114 
00115                 if(maxPenetrationIndex != 1) {
00116                         res1 = calcArea4Points(pt.m_localPointA,m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA);
00117                 }
00118 
00119                 if(maxPenetrationIndex != 2) {
00120                         res2 = calcArea4Points(pt.m_localPointA,m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA);
00121                 }
00122 
00123                 if(maxPenetrationIndex != 3) {
00124                         res3 = calcArea4Points(pt.m_localPointA,m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA);
00125                 }
00126         }
00127         b3Vector4 maxvec(res0,res1,res2,res3);
00128         int biggestarea = maxvec.closestAxis4();
00129         return biggestarea;
00130         
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 int b3ContactCache::getCacheEntry(const b3Vector3& newPoint) const
00135 {
00136         b3Scalar shortestDist =  getContactBreakingThreshold() * getContactBreakingThreshold();
00137         int size = getNumContacts();
00138         int nearestPoint = -1;
00139         for( int i = 0; i < size; i++ )
00140         {
00141                 const b3Vector3 &mp = m_pointCache[i];
00142 
00143                 b3Vector3 diffA =  mp.m_localPointA- newPoint.m_localPointA;
00144                 const b3Scalar distToManiPoint = diffA.dot(diffA);
00145                 if( distToManiPoint < shortestDist )
00146                 {
00147                         shortestDist = distToManiPoint;
00148                         nearestPoint = i;
00149                 }
00150         }
00151         return nearestPoint;
00152 }
00153 
00154 int b3ContactCache::addManifoldPoint(const b3Vector3& newPoint)
00155 {
00156         b3Assert(validContactDistance(newPoint));
00157         
00158         int insertIndex = getNumContacts();
00159         if (insertIndex == MANIFOLD_CACHE_SIZE)
00160         {
00161 #if MANIFOLD_CACHE_SIZE >= 4
00162                 //sort cache so best points come first, based on area
00163                 insertIndex = sortCachedPoints(newPoint);
00164 #else
00165                 insertIndex = 0;
00166 #endif
00167                 clearUserCache(m_pointCache[insertIndex]);
00168                 
00169         } else
00170         {
00171                 m_cachedPoints++;
00172 
00173                 
00174         }
00175         if (insertIndex<0)
00176                 insertIndex=0;
00177 
00178         //b3Assert(m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_userPersistentData==0);
00179         m_pointCache[insertIndex] = newPoint;
00180         return insertIndex;
00181 }
00182 
00183 #endif
00184 
00185 bool b3ContactCache::validContactDistance(const b3Vector3& pt)
00186 {
00187         return pt.w <= gContactBreakingThreshold;
00188 }
00189 
00190 void b3ContactCache::removeContactPoint(struct b3Contact4Data& newContactCache,int i)
00191 {
00192         int numContacts = b3Contact4Data_getNumPoints(&newContactCache);
00193         if (i!=(numContacts-1))
00194         {
00195                 b3Swap(newContactCache.m_localPosA[i],newContactCache.m_localPosA[numContacts-1]);
00196                 b3Swap(newContactCache.m_localPosB[i],newContactCache.m_localPosB[numContacts-1]);
00197                 b3Swap(newContactCache.m_worldPosB[i],newContactCache.m_worldPosB[numContacts-1]);
00198         }
00199         b3Contact4Data_setNumPoints(&newContactCache,numContacts-1);
00200 
00201 }
00202 
00203 
00204 void b3ContactCache::refreshContactPoints(const b3Transform& trA,const b3Transform& trB, struct b3Contact4Data& contacts)
00205 {
00206 
00207         int numContacts = b3Contact4Data_getNumPoints(&contacts);
00208         
00209 
00210         int i;
00212         for (i=numContacts-1;i>=0;i--)
00213         {
00214                 b3Vector3 worldPosA = trA( contacts.m_localPosA[i]);
00215                 b3Vector3 worldPosB = trB( contacts.m_localPosB[i]);
00216                 contacts.m_worldPosB[i] = worldPosB;
00217                 float distance = (worldPosA -  worldPosB).dot(contacts.m_worldNormalOnB);
00218                 contacts.m_worldPosB[i].w = distance;
00219         }
00220 
00222         b3Scalar distance2d;
00223         b3Vector3 projectedDifference,projectedPoint;
00224         for (i=numContacts-1;i>=0;i--)
00225         {
00226                 b3Vector3 worldPosA = trA( contacts.m_localPosA[i]);
00227                 b3Vector3 worldPosB = trB( contacts.m_localPosB[i]);
00228                 b3Vector3&pt = contacts.m_worldPosB[i];
00229                 //contact becomes invalid when signed distance exceeds margin (projected on contactnormal direction)
00230                 if (!validContactDistance(pt))
00231                 {
00232                         removeContactPoint(contacts,i);
00233                 } else
00234                 {
00235                         //contact also becomes invalid when relative movement orthogonal to normal exceeds margin
00236                         projectedPoint = worldPosA - contacts.m_worldNormalOnB * contacts.m_worldPosB[i].w;
00237                         projectedDifference = contacts.m_worldPosB[i] - projectedPoint;
00238                         distance2d = projectedDifference.dot(projectedDifference);
00239                         if (distance2d  > gContactBreakingThreshold*gContactBreakingThreshold )
00240                         {
00241                                 removeContactPoint(contacts,i);
00242                         } else
00243                         {
00245                                 //if (gContactProcessedCallback)
00246                                 //      (*gContactProcessedCallback)(manifoldPoint,(void*)m_body0,(void*)m_body1);
00247                         }
00248                 }
00249         }
00250         
00251 
00252 }
